css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-0d3aa06f-u{min-width:100%;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);padding-top:150px;padding-bottom:0px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-0d3aa06f-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),1);display:block;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-0d3aa06f-u .comment{padding-top:30px;
